medical_history.history_of_present_illness: Symptoms began four months prior to hospitalization, with the patient experiencing urgency and frequency.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Previous exploratory laparotomy revealed a large mass involving the dome of the bladder, posterior bladder wall, seminal vesicles, and prostate, confirmed by biopsy to be a plexiform neuroma.
medical_history.family_history: Mother had cafe au lait spots.
